subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Omir Santos’s popularity soared Monday night, when he hit his first career home run, a grand slam that fueled the Mets’ 7-1 victory against the Marlins at Citi Field.
snippet: Omir Santos’s popularity soared Monday night, when he hit his first career home run, a grand slam that fueled the Mets’ 7-1 victory against the Marlins at Citi Field.
